oai_dc:dc.dc:title: WOOL!!
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ROBERT ARMSTRONG
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: WOOL!! Burred, Picked and Carded without extra charge. Robert Armstrong. No date. Broadside.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Wool; Machinery; Ephemera; Broadsides;
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: For information on license and use fees and acquiring high-resolution image files, contact DigitalCollections@knoxlib.org or phone 865 215-8814.
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: WOOL!! Burred, Picked and Carded without extra charge. I am prepared to clean WOOL from COCKLE BURRS, BURDOCK or CUMFREY BURRS, STICKS, TRASH, DYE-CHIPS, &c., more thoroughly and with less injury to the WOOL than if cleansed by hand. All that is necessary is to wash your wool thoroughly and grease it well and send it along and I will guarantee you get the best of rolls, and have saved yourselves the tedious and tiresome job of burring and picking your wool by hand. I will receive wool and return it every week until October 10th at the store of GRAVES & HENRY. dealers in General Merchandise, East side of Market Square, Knoxville and at Armstrong's Ferry, Holston River.—No extra charge. Terms, 8 1/3 cts. per pound for Plain. and 12 1/2 cts. for Mixedd Wool Payment required on Delivery. My Machine is located 6 miles East of Knoxville, on the E. T., Va & Ga, R. R. Give me a trial and be convinced for yourself. ROBERT ARMSTRONG. PRESS AND MESSENGER PRINT.
